articles.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 pre-orders include early campaign access
articles.description: Activision may have figured out how to get more people to play Call of Duty’s story by including early access to Modern Warfare 2 for those who pre-order.
articles.content: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 officially launches on Oct. 28, but players who pre-order the game (digitally, that is) will get early access to the games single-player campaign for a week, Activision… [+1755 chars]

articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Discord has plans to deal with the latest waves of scams
articles.description: Discord has been hit with a new scam that targets its users with tailored messages meant to suggest private photos of a user have been leaked online. Discord is working on a fix, a representative told Polygon.
articles.content: If youre active on the popular messaging app Discord, you might have noticed a troubling trend. Over the past few months, Discord scams have increased not just in number, but in savviness, as scammer… [+3496 chars]

articles.title: Lord of the Rings: The Rings Of Power will premiere with two episodes
articles.description: Amazon Prime’s Lord of the Rings series — Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power — will premiere with two episodes on Sept. 1. The whole season will be eight episodes long.

articles.title: Xbox Game Pass August adds Immortality, Coffee Talk, and more
articles.description: Xbox Game Pass adds some new games. Immortality, Immortals: Fenyx Rising, Coffee Talk, and more will arrive, along with some new DLC and events for Sea of Thieves and Nakara: Bladepoint.

articles.title: Jet ski racing classic Wave Race 64 splashing onto Nintendo Switch Online
articles.description: Nintendo 64 jet ski racing game Wave Race 64 comes to Nintendo Switch Online and Expansion Pack this Friday, Aug. 19

articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: Fortnite x Dragon Ball Super event detailed, including skins, gliders, quests, and more
articles.description: In the huge crossover event, Goku, Vegeta, Bulma and Beerus arrive as skins; Power Unleashed! quests award a Shenron Glider; Kamehamehas and Nimbus Clouds come to battle royale; there’s an anime festival, an adventure island, and more
articles.content: Theres even a whole Dragon Ball theme park.
